caption.p: Means of inhibition growth diameter obtained by disc diffusion method (mm). Data are expressed as inhibition zone (mm) and presented as a mean ± standard error of the mean. C - clove oil, E - eucalyptus oil, T - thyme oil. No significant differences between inhibition zone for clove oil, eucalyptus oil and thyme oil were found (K-W test, p < 0.05).
